bibl.title: Dispatch from John A. Parm to William Hunter, March 31, 1879
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

correspAction.roleName: Second Assistant U.S. Secretary of State

div1.p:
United State Consulate at Sierra Leone
31st March 1879

John A Parm
To Department of State.

Abstract of Contents
Acknowledging the receipt of Dispatches Nos 7, 8, & 9.

U.S. Consulate at Sierra Leone
March 31st 1879

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your Despatch of the 15th ulto. Nos 7, 8, & 9. Calling my attention to Article X of the Consular Regulation: and enclosing an Official bond to be executed by Mr R. Hamilburge.
Mr Hamilburge is at present out of town, and as soon as he returns I will request him to execute the bond at once, and will forward the same to the Department immediately thereafter.

I have the honor to be
Sir
Your Obt Servant
John A. Parm
U.S. Consul
